exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x, i : Z_Zp H : i ⊗ x = Op H0 : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> Z_Zp H1 : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> nat Unable to unify "nat" with "divides 1 p".

In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False H0 : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> {i : Z_Zp | i ⊗ x = Op} x, i : Z_Zp H : i ⊗ x = Op H1 : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> Z_Zp H2 : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> nat Unable to unify "nat" with "divides 1 p".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: split; [apply divides_refl | split; [apply divides_refl | intros k H1 H2; apply divides_refl]].
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x, i : Z_Zp H : i ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "proj1_sig x" with "1".

original: intros x i H. unfold is_gcd. intros H0. split. - apply Zp_mult_invert. apply H0. - split; [apply divides_refl | split; [apply divides_refl | intros k H1 H2; apply divides_refl]].
